header_case_always: Please recheck if the header conforms to the specified {{style}} format.
header_case_never: Please recheck if the header includes any forbidden {{style}} format.
header_full_stop_always: Please recheck if the header ends with the specified character '{{char}}'.
header_full_stop_never: Please recheck if the header includes any forbidden ending character '{{char}}'.
header_max_length_always: Please recheck if the header exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
header_max_length_never: Please recheck if the header is shorter than the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
header_min_length_always: Please recheck if the header is shorter than the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
header_min_length_never: Please recheck if the header exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
header_trim_always: Please recheck if the header contains any illegal starting characters.
header_trim_never: Please recheck if the header does not contain the specified starting characters.
type_enum_always: Please recheck if the type is in the whitelist.
type_enum_never: Please recheck if the type is in the blacklist.
type_case_always: Please recheck if the type conforms to the specified {{style}} format.
type_case_never: Please recheck if the type is in an illegal {{style}} format.
body_full_stop_always: Please recheck if the body ends with the specified character '{{char}}'.
body_full_stop_never: Please recheck if the body includes any forbidden ending character '{{char}}'.
body_empty_always: Please ensure the body remains empty.
body_empty_never: Please ensure the body is not an empty string.
body_max_length_always: Please recheck if the body exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
body_max_length_never: Please recheck if the body is shorter than the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
body_max_line-length_always: Please recheck if the number of lines in the body exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
body_max_line-length_never: Please recheck if the number of lines in the body is below the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
body_min_length_always: Please recheck if the body is shorter than the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
body_min_length_never: Please recheck if the body exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
body_case_always: Please recheck if the body conforms to the specified {{style}} format.
body_case_never: Please recheck if the body contains any illegal {{style}} format.
footer_empty_always: Please ensure the footer remains empty.
footer_empty_never: Please ensure the footer is not an empty string.
footer_max_length_always: Please recheck if the footer exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
footer_max_length_never: Please recheck if the footer is shorter than the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
footer_max_line-length_always: Please recheck if the number of lines in the footer exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
footer_max_line-length_never: Please recheck if the number of lines in the footer is below the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
footer_min_length_always: Please recheck if the footer is shorter than the minimum length limit of {{length}}.
footer_min_length_never: Please recheck if the footer exceeds the maximum length limit of {{length}}.
